attributes.action: Lower the year span of smear tests for women who test negative for HPV
attributes.additional_details: This needs to change as by the time symptoms show this can be way to late. This is a massive step back for women and it’s not acceptable.
attributes.background: recently the NHS has announced they will be now extending the amount of time between smears for women who test negative for the HPV virus. This has changed from three years to five which is a massive step back for women. As you know a lot can change between and there’s not always Symptoms

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729981
